channel.title: Help with webclient PLEASE
channel.description:
Okay, so my me and my buddy are making a webclient for out server.
We are getting an error, and can't find it. It has something to do with progresschecker, but at the same time it's not a problem with progresschecker. It's confusing, and I'm an amateur at this stuff, so if you can please help us that would be awesome.
We can communicate through skype/teamviewer, and he is even willing to pay a couple of bucks to whoever can do this. It would be GREATLY appreciated!
Most of you will probably read this and be like, "go read a tutorial". The thing is, he did, and now he's having a problem. Thank you. :)

item.title: Help with webclient PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @flare2555 flare2555
item.description:

Okay, so my me and my buddy are making a webclient for out server.
